mecard

Class Request

  • java.lang.Object
    • mecard.Request

  • public final class Request
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a Metro request. It includes the query code, authorization token, customer which may be 'null', user id, and PIN which in some cases may be empty depending on the query type.
    Author:
    Andrew Nisbet
